ygData.subject: Re: Illigeble Scoll and Rondo
ygData.msgSnippet: Jimmy, you re infected with a virus called Happy99.  It secretly sends out a copy of itself when you email someone.  In this case, it sent itself to everyone
ygData.messageBody:
Jimmy, you're infected with a virus called Happy99. It secretly sends out
a copy of itself when you email someone. In this case, it sent itself to
everyone on the EQ-Quest mailing list. Visit www.mcafee.com, get a virus
scanner, and run it to disinfect yourself.

Subscribers, scan your harddrive for a file attachment called happy99.exe
and delete it. *Do not run it.*

-Pennaggolan


At 09:22 AM 06/30/1999, you wrote:
>From: "Jimmy Lind" <j_baouns@...>
>
>
>Attachment Converted: "C:\TEMP\Happy99.exe"
>
